column3: Added one small preparation commit since not all environments where passing travis.
Needed rebase after #10195. Just run the sed scripts again. Review should be as simple as it was, more or less.
Concept ACK. Nit: you can add a commit that removes the `#include <boost/foreach.hpp>` directives.

> you can add a commit that removes the #include <boost/foreach.hpp> directives.\n\nBut not in the whole project yet, because I'm not able to remove BOOST_REVERSE_FOREACH yet, see #10193 on top of this one. I can remove it only on the files that I can for now.
